trans-unit.source: A simple API, built for humans wishing to develop with Plone.
Add disable_roles_acquisition and enable_roles_acquisition to api.content [MrTango]
Add method to check if ZODB is in read-only mode. [loechel]
Added local TOCS to main docs pages. Fixes #90. [jaroel]
Added six to deal with Python 2 / 3 compatibility. [rudaporto]
Allow adopting to a Special User. Fixes #320 - checking permissions for Anonymous User. [jaroel]
Allow plone.api.group.get_groups for Anonymous user. Refs #290 [jaroel]
Allow to set/get registry settings from an interface. https://github.com/plone/plone.api/issues/269 [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: Allow to set/get registry settings from an interface. https://github.com/plone/plone.api/issues/269 [gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Amend user.get method to accept a userid parameter, refs #112. [cewing, xiru, winstonf88]
Change api.group.get_groups to work with CMF master. [jaroel]
Change content.delete to allow both obj=None and objects=[] or objects=None. Fixes issue 383. [jaroel]
trans-unit.target: Change content.delete to allow both obj=None and objects=[] or objects=None. Fixes issue 383. [jaroel]

trans-unit.source: Cleanup code to match Plone’s style guide. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: Cleanup code to match Plone’s style guide. [gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Code Style Guide. [iElectric, cillianderoiste, marciomazza, RichyB, thet, zupo]
Decorators for defining constraints on api methods. Depend on
Deprecate plone.api on ReadTheDocs and redirect to api.plone.org, refs #130. [wormj, zupo]
Do not reassign dynamic roles as local roles when using group.grant_roles(). [pbauer]
Do not reassign dynamic roles as local roles when using user.grant_roles(). Fixes same issue as #351 for groups. [pbauer]
Do not reassign global roles as local roles when using group.grant_roles() [pbauer]
Documentation how to get/set member properties. [zupo]
Don’t rename an object when the id already is the target id. Fixes issue 361. [jaroel]
trans-unit.target: Don’t rename an object when the id already is the target id. Fixes issue 361. [jaroel]

trans-unit.source: Fix PRINTINGMAILHOST_ENABLED evaluation to respect Products.PrintingMailHost internal logic [ale-rt]
Fix README.rst so it renders correctly on PyPI. [zupo]
Fix api.content copy/move/rename functions to return the object after they change content, refs #115. [rodfersou]
Fix corner case on content.transition code: if a transition only has exit transitions and no transition goes back to it
Fix error in tests that try to add built-in roles, which no longer fails silently in Zope4. [MatthewWilkes]
Fix failing AT Collection creation when using api.content.create. [gbastien]
Fix imports from Globals that was removed in Zope4 [pbauer]
Fix translation related tests to use the
Fix use of Globals.DB which was removed in Zope4 (Fix https://github.com/plone/plone.api/issues/385) [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Fix use of Globals.DB which was removed in Zope4 (Fix https://github.com/plone/plone.api/issues/385) [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fixed Plone 5 version comparison in tests. [maurits]
Fixed long description of package to be valid restructured text, displaying nicely on PyPI. [maurits]
Fixed regular expression in test for Plone version. [maurits]
Fixes #184 NameChooser on rename used the wrong way and fails on safe_id=True. [benniboy]
Fixes Tests and code convention son this repository. [loechel]

Fixes if a content is copied in the same folder or in a target folder, where same source id exists, the existing source(same folder) or third object (same id as source) gets renamed instead of the target. [benniboy]
Get email_charset value from the configuration registry, falling back to portal property if not found. [esteele]
Get the portal path with absolute_url_path. [cillianderoiste]
Gracefully handle missing registry records on an interface.
Ignore local roles granted on parents when using “inherit=False” in either user.get_roles or group.get_roles. Fixes #354 [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Ignore local roles granted on parents when using “inherit=False” in either user.get_roles or group.get_roles. Fixes #354 [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Improved code quality according to isort and flake8. [maurits]
In api.content.move if source and target are specified and target is already source parent, skip the operation.
trans-unit.target: In api.content.move if source and target are specified and target is already source parent, skip the operation.
Include local roles granted from being in a group when using “inherit=False” in user.get_roles. Fixes #346 [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Increase test coverage. [cillianderoiste, JessN, reinhardt, zupo]
Initial release. [davisagli, fulv, iElectric, jcerjak, jonstahl, kcleong, mauritsvanrees, wamdam, witsch, zupo]
List supported Plone versions in setup.py. [zupo]
Make Travis IRC notification message to be one-line instead of three-lines. [zupo]
Make all assertRaise() calls use the
Make api.content.create() also print out the underlying error, refs #118. [winston88]
Make get_view and get_tool tests not have hardcoded list of all expected values. [RichyB, cillianderoiste]
trans-unit.target: Make get_view and get_tool tests not have hardcoded list of all expected values. [RichyB, cillianderoiste]

trans-unit.source: More examples of good and bad code blocks in documentation, more information on how to write good docstrings. [zupo]
Move most of text from docs/index.rst to README.rst so its also visible on PyPI and GitHub. [zupo]
New bootstrap.py to stay in the land of zc.buildout 1.x. [zupo]
Package now includes a copy of the GPLv2 license as stated in the GNU General Public License documentation. [hvelarde]
Passing inherit=False to groups.get_roles() will only get local roles for the group. [pbauer]
Please read the document Process for Plone core’s development. Also consult the section about contribution in the plone.api contributors documentation.
trans-unit.target: Please read the document Process for Plone core’s development. Also consult the section about contribution in the plone.api contributors documentation.

trans-unit.source: Plone 4.0 and 4.1 are now tested under Python 2.6 on CI. [hvelarde]
Prefer single quotes over double quotes in code style. [zupo]
Proof-read the docs, improved grammar and wording. [cewing]
Remove print statements and use @security decorators to make code-analysis happy. [ale-rt]
Remove the Plone APIs conventions. They are moved to http://docs.plone.org/develop/styleguide and http://docs.plone.org/develop/coredev/docs/git.html [thet]
trans-unit.target: Remove the Plone APIs conventions. They are moved to http://docs.plone.org/develop/styleguide and http://docs.plone.org/develop/coredev/docs/git.html [thet]

trans-unit.source: Removed allow-hosts from base.cfg, so we can use the new pypi warehouse. Refs https://github.com/plone/plone.api/issues/403 [jaroel]
trans-unit.target: Removed allow-hosts from base.cfg, so we can use the new pypi warehouse. Refs https://github.com/plone/plone.api/issues/403 [jaroel]

trans-unit.source: Removed dependency on Products.CMFPlone to avoid circular dependencies. Products.CMFPlone will be there. [jaroel]
Removed duplicate and failing inline doctest for content.find. [maurits] (#437)
Rerelease, as 1.4.9 misses the doctests directory. [maurits]
Resolve issues with CHANGES.rst symlink that prevented 1.2.0 from being installed in some circumstances. [mattss]
Show only local roles when inherit=False. [tschorr]

Simplification/minor speedup: Permissions checks now directly use AccessControl. Technical its now exact the same as before. Before a tool lookup was needed, calling a utility function, calling AccessControl. [jensens]
Support Zope users in user.adopt_user. Fixes #171 and #157. [jaroel]
Support user.get_roles for anonymous users. Refs #339 [jaroel]
Symlink doctests so that they’ll be included in the built egg and don’t break coredev builds. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: Symlink doctests so that they’ll be included in the built egg and don’t break coredev builds. [esteele]

trans-unit.source: This change fixes a bug in the earlier implementation that could cause errors in some situations. This situation will only arise if the userid and username for a user are not the same. If membrane is being used for content- based user objects, or if email-as-login is enabled and a user has changed their email address this will be the case. In the previous implementation the username parameter was implicitly being treated as userid. The new implementation does not do so. If consumer code is relying on this bug and passing userid, and if that code uses the username parameter as a keyword parameter, then lookup will fail. In all other cases, there should be no difference.
trans-unit.target: This change fixes a bug in the earlier implementation that could cause errors in some situations. This situation will only arise if the userid and username for a user are not the same. If membrane is being used for content- based user objects, or if email-as-login is enabled and a user has changed their email address this will be the case. In the previous implementation the username parameter was implicitly being treated as userid. The new implementation does not do so. If consumer code is relying on this bug and passing userid, and if that code uses the username parameter as a keyword parameter, then lookup will fail. In all other cases, there should be no difference.

Try to get use_email_as_login from registry first. [pbauer]

trans-unit.target: Updated release, adding new features, test coverage, cleanup & refactor. [hvelarde, avelino, ericof, jpgimenez, xiru, macagua, zupo]

trans-unit.source: Use Plone 4.3 on development by default (was 4.2). [hvelarde]
Use getUserById to find the user when given a User object in adopt_user. [tschanzt]
Use plone.api methods in plone.api codebase. [zupo]
Use the source’s parent as a target when no target is specified. [jaroel]
trans-unit.target: Use the source’s parent as a target when no target is specified. [jaroel]

trans-unit.source: Use the version defined in Products.CMFPlone in env.plone_version, just like Plone’s control panel. Also fixes Jenkins testrunner where we don’t have the Plone egg. [jaroel]
trans-unit.target: Use the version defined in Products.CMFPlone in env.plone_version, just like Plone’s control panel. Also fixes Jenkins testrunner where we don’t have the Plone egg. [jaroel]

and overwriting values already set by
api.plone.org docs point to docs.plone.org/external/plone.api/docs/. Refs #202 [jaroel]
at the Plone code repository hosted at GitHub.

trans-unit.source: comes with cookbook-like documentation and step-by-step instructions for doing common development tasks in Plone. Recipes try to assume the user does not have extensive knowledge about Plone internals.
trans-unit.target: comes with cookbook-like documentation and step-by-step instructions for doing common development tasks in Plone. Recipes try to assume the user does not have extensive knowledge about Plone internals.

do the language negotiation for our
does not always give the correct one, especially with combined languages:
explicit dependencies in setup.py, explicit zcml loading in tests. [jensens]
is an adapter now. It can’t be proofed to be equal when fetched twice. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: module for interacting with global environment. [RichyB]
overhaul of documentation: semantic linebreaks, few links fixed, minor rewording. [jensens]
plone.api.content.delete: add option check_linkintegrity. If True raise exception if deleting would result in broken links. [pbauer]
plone.api.content.find: object_provides arguments accepts tuples. Fixes #266. [ale-rt]
plone.api.content.get_state now allows for an optional default value. This is used when no workflow is defined for the object. Refs #246 [jaroel]
plone.api.content.transition: Now accepts kwargs that can be supplied to the workflow transition. [neilferreira]
plone.api.portal.get_registry_record now suggests look-alike records when no records is found. Refs #249. [jaroel]
reST syntax in documentation, follow style-guide, adjust setup.py [svx]
staying introspectable and discoverable, important aspects of being Pythonic.
symlink that prevented 1.3.0 from being installed. And please never ever in future use symlinks in eggs, ok? [jensens]
test to be able to deal with development versions of Zope. [thet]
to build the project, run tests, generate documentation, etc. [witsch]
to cover as much as possible the tasks carried out by a Plone developer
to provide clear API methods for Plone functionality which may be confusing or difficult to access,
to return object instead of path. [pbauer]
update documentation links, we live in docs.plone.org/develop/plone.api now [polyester]
